Articles.Content:
I have been playing KSP for a month or so, but I hadn't decided to post in the board, but well, hello!

The game is amusing and addictive. I spent many hours... crashing around. I have gto play at minimum to get a good amount of FPS, but this is so fun... it reminds me of my early X-BTF games, crashing at stations because I couldn't into piloting.

Well, here you are, a little milestone of mine. I got to Laythe in only a month! ... sort of

Next project, to rescue Jeremiah!
